ovdesc.p: This system updated table stores Statement Opening Dates and Opening Balances of Cycle 1 Account Statements and Passbooks.

desc.p: Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
This system updated table stores Statement Opening Dates and Opening Balances for Cycle 1 Account Statements and Passbooks.
Key of this table would be a valid Account record key.

t.desc:
Specifies the Statement Opening Date and Opening Balance for the Cycle1 Account Statements and Passbooks for the Account specified in the key of the record.
The Opening Date is in the format YYYYMMDD. The Opening Date and Opening Balance are separated by a '/'
Validation Rules:
System updated field.
